p: The cellular component targets are related only to the GABA-A receptor complex, postsynaptic cell membrane, and dendritic membrane. The enrichment analysis of the KEGG pathway ( Figure 6) showed that these action targets were mainly related to neuroactive ligand-receptor interactions, calcium signaling pathways, taste transduction, morphine addiction, GABAergic synapses, etc. It has been noted that aloe essential oil has sedative and hypnotic effects, and its mechanism may be related to the regulation of the GABAergic system [ 34].
